net.heroicefforts.viable.android.rep
Interface Repository

All Known Implementing Classes:
GIssueTrackerRepository, JIRARepository
public interface Repository

This is the main service interface implemented by bridges to the various issue tracking systems.

Author:
jevans

Method Summary
 Issue exists(Issue issue)
          The service performs a checksum lookup to determine if the issue data already exists in the repository.
 Issue findById(String issueId)
          The service attempts to locate the issue by unique id.
 CommentSet findCommentsForIssue(String issueId, int page, int pageSize)
          Returns a page of comments belonging to the issue specified.
 ProjectDetail getApplicationStats()
          Returns summary data corresponding to this repository / project.
 List<VersionDetail> getApplicationVersions()
          Returns the release version details associated with this repository / project.
 Set<? extends IssueResource> getDefaultDefectStates()
          Returns a set of IssueResources representing user selectable states for defect issue types.
 Set<? extends IssueResource> getDefaultStates()
          Returns a set of IssueResources representing user selectable states for all issue types.
 IssueResource getState(String type, String priority, String state)
          Returns an IssueResource matching the state of the issue.
 IssueResource getUninstallState()
          Return the default state for uninstall tracking.
 int postIssue(Issue issue)
          Adds a new issue to the repository.
 int postIssueComment(Issue issue, Comment comment)
          Adds a new issue comment to the repository.
 SearchResults search(SearchParams params)
          Searches for issues matching the supplied parameters.
 boolean vote(Issue issue)
          Submits a vote for the specified issue on behalf of the user.
 

Method Detail

exists

Issue exists(Issue issue)
             throws ServiceException
The service performs a checksum lookup to determine if the issue data already exists in the repository. If so, then the issue is returned. Checksum calcs are to be determined by the service.

Parameters:
issue - the issue to check
Returns:
the located issue, or null
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

findById

Issue findById(String issueId)
               throws ServiceException
The service attempts to locate the issue by unique id.

Parameters:
issueId - the issue's unique identifier as provided by the repository.
Returns:
the located issue, or null
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

search

SearchResults search(SearchParams params)
                     throws ServiceException
Searches for issues matching the supplied parameters.

Parameters:
params - the search criteria
Returns:
results matching the critieria.
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

postIssue

int postIssue(Issue issue)
              throws ServiceException
Adds a new issue to the repository. The supplied issue should be updated with the repository supplied id and any other changed data.

Parameters:
issue - the issue to add
Returns:
the response code
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

postIssueComment

int postIssueComment(Issue issue,
                     Comment comment)
                     throws ServiceException
Adds a new issue comment to the repository. The supplied comment should be updated with the repository supplied id and any other changed data.

Parameters:
issue - the issue to which the comment should be posted
comment - the comment to post
Returns:
the response code
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

findCommentsForIssue

CommentSet findCommentsForIssue(String issueId,
                                int page,
                                int pageSize)
                                throws ServiceException
Returns a page of comments belonging to the issue specified.

Parameters:
issueId - the id of the issue
page - the page to fetch (1-based).
pageSize - the number of results to return.
Returns:
the page of comments
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

getApplicationStats

ProjectDetail getApplicationStats()
                                  throws ServiceException
Returns summary data corresponding to this repository / project. Some of this data may be pulled from the repository or from the client's application meta-data depending upon the implementation limitations.

Returns:
the project summary details
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

getApplicationVersions

List<VersionDetail> getApplicationVersions()
                                           throws ServiceException
Returns the release version details associated with this repository / project.

Returns:
a non-null list of release details.
Throws:
ServiceException - if a service error occurs.

vote

boolean vote(Issue issue)
             throws ServiceException
Submits a vote for the specified issue on behalf of the user.

Parameters:
issue - the issue for which to vote
Returns:
true if the vote was successful.
Throws:
ServiceException

getState

IssueResource getState(String type,
                       String priority,
                       String state)
Returns an IssueResource matching the state of the issue.

Parameters:
type - the issue type
priority - the issue priority
state - the issue state
Returns:
an issue resource

getDefaultDefectStates

Set<? extends IssueResource> getDefaultDefectStates()
Returns a set of IssueResources representing user selectable states for defect issue types.

Returns:

getDefaultStates

Set<? extends IssueResource> getDefaultStates()
Returns a set of IssueResources representing user selectable states for all issue types.

Returns:

getUninstallState

IssueResource getUninstallState()
Return the default state for uninstall tracking.
